msg: Make serf_get accept a client certificate and associated password to use during
(app_baton_t): Add pem_path and pem_pwd member variables.

(apr_getopt_option_t options): New definition, used for command line options
(print_usage): Dynamically log supported command line options.
(main): Add support for long option names, accept client certificate file
and password. Add commented out code to enable debug logging using the
